org.apache.flink.api.common.state

类 FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<FoldingState<T,ACC>,ACC>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.state.FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the values folded int othe state
    ACC - Type of the value in the state
    所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable

    @PublicEvolving
public class FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC>
extends StateDescriptor<FoldingState<T,ACC>,ACC>
    StateDescriptor for FoldingState. This can be used to create partitioned folding state.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FoldingStateDescriptor

        public FoldingStateDescriptor(String name,
                              ACC initialValue,
                              FoldFunction<T,ACC> foldFunction,
                              Class<ACC> typeClass)
        Creates a new FoldingStateDescriptor with the given name, type, and initial value.

        If this constructor fails (because it is not possible to describe the type via a class), consider using the #FoldingStateDescriptor(String, ACC, FoldFunction, TypeInformation) constructor.

        参数:
        name - The (unique) name for the state.
        initialValue - The initial value of the fold.
        foldFunction - The FoldFunction used to aggregate the state.
        typeClass - The type of the values in the state.

      • FoldingStateDescriptor

        public FoldingStateDescriptor(String name,
                              ACC initialValue,
                              FoldFunction<T,ACC> foldFunction,
                              TypeInformation<ACC> typeInfo)
        Creates a new FoldingStateDescriptor with the given name and default value.
        参数:
        name - The (unique) name for the state.
        initialValue - The initial value of the fold.
        foldFunction - The FoldFunction used to aggregate the state.
        typeInfo - The type of the values in the state.

      • FoldingStateDescriptor

        public FoldingStateDescriptor(String name,
                              ACC initialValue,
                              FoldFunction<T,ACC> foldFunction,
                              TypeSerializer<ACC> typeSerializer)
        Creates a new ValueStateDescriptor with the given name and default value.
        参数:
        name - The (unique) name for the state.
        initialValue - The initial value of the fold.
        foldFunction - The FoldFunction used to aggregate the state.
        typeSerializer - The type serializer of the values in the state.
